Geschossfl채chenzahl (GFZ): Geschossfl채chenzahl (GFZ): represents the ratio of the total floor area of all building stories to the plot area. It controls the horizontal spread of buildings.
Grundfl채chenzahl (GRZ): Grundfl채chenzahl (GRZ):   represents the proportion of the plot area that can be covered by buildings. It controls the vertical density (i.e., the total built-up floor area).
